duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintaining the community to market readiness standards, overseeing operations, lease administration, budgeting, reporting, collections, and marketing.
Providing superior customer service and communication to residents to enhance satisfaction and increase renewals, revenue, reputation, and profitability.
Developing, mentoring, leading, and managing a high-performing team, including leasing, customer service, maintenance, and management personnel.
Driving revenues through understanding competition, analysis of development, and implementing creative marketing programs.
Instilling and modeling the company's mission, supervising day-to-day operations, and ensuring policies and procedures are followed.
Maintaining aspects of the community budget and finances, ensuring leasing/marketing goals are being met.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree preferred, Real Estate License preferred
